metadata.description: Furious race from Hell in a blazing arena of horror! Welcome to the scorching-hot track where cursed souls race at the speed of sin, anything and everything goes, and the only rule is no rule- it’s the spectacle known as the Ghost Races; the most hellish “entertainment” known to Battleworld! 1st place prize: temporary freedom from the Arena, but what happens to the unlucky and unholy losers? It’s all-out, high-speed warfare among the most bizarre and vicious Ghost Riders of the Marvel Universe. Expect many familiar skulls!
metadata.name: Ghost Racers
